PackageDescription: Name or short description of this document package. E.g. "MRB-01", "Transmittal 4"
Recipient: The name of the company receiving this document. Typically your customer.
ProjectEmail: Email specified for customers internal project

Lines.PublicRegisterArticleNo: An article number from a public register. Prefixed with a short-name for the public register. E.g. NRF-xxx, NOBB-xxx
Lines.ArticleDescription: A description of the purchased article
Lines.Dimension: A specification of the dimensions of the purchased article
Lines.Quality: Some form of description of the articles quality. E.g. UNS-number
Lines.BatchId: Manufacturers Batch identificator: HeatNo / ChargeNo / Schmelz / BatchNo
Lines.SerialNo: Other typical form of identification of complex parts. E.g. Serial number or PartNo
Lines.CodeNo: Secondary form of identification of complex parts.
Lines.Tag: A specialized tag provided by the customer for the orderline related to this.

BatchData.ProjectEmail: Override: Email specified for customers internal project
BatchData.SupplierSoNo: Override: Your (as supplier) sales order number
BatchData.SupplierOrderContactPerson: Override: Contact person stated on order

Docs.CommonDescription: A optional description currently used when visualizing Open Data.
Docs.Issuer: Usually name of Manufacturer or Classification society
Docs.DocType: Common name of the document type
Docs.DocTypeCode: Shorter codes, defined by the project
Docs.DocTypeDescription: A more extensive description of the document type. Mainly used for mapping to the recipients document types, if they use different common names.
